statement.p: What is the area of the triangle above?

solution.p: Because we have side lengths but not angles or a height, we will use Heron's Formula.
The semi-perimeter is \displaystyle\frac{{1}}{{2}}{\left({4.84}+{4.24}+{2.77}\right)}={5.925} which has 3 significant digits.
Each factor has at least 3 significant digits so the product does as well.
